name: 東方携帯曲
summary:
THBGMPlay(東方携帯曲) is a fan-made Touhou(東方) BGM Player for Android device.
THBGMPlay is based on songlist file format for maintaining song file for playback.
It can playback BGM music from TH6 to TH12, and TH7.5, TH10.5, TH12.3 as well
OGG format playback supported as well.

Requirement:
Android 1.6 minimum required
Large SDCard space for store Touhou BGM data file
Tested on Android from 1.6 to 2.2 and maybe higher as well
Milestone(Maybe Droid too)
X10i
Android X86
TRANSLATOR NEEDED, please email me if you know how to translate and you need to translate into your native language, I will give you the words need to be translate.

If your device cannot run this app, please let me know. Thanks
info:
• 中文名: THBGMPlay
  • 平台: Android
  • 游戏类型: icebahamut
  • 游玩人数: 1
  • 售价: free
  • 官方网站: https://market.android.com/details?id=music.thbgmplay
